title: Decision Point & Building Value
objective: Help guests reach a confident decision by clarifying what matters most, translating features into real-life outcomes, and using a calm, fact-based ‘Decision Point’ conversation that keeps the process simple and trust-first.
position_in_journey: Selection → Emotional Test Drive → Decision Point (commitment + value clarity before numbers)
description: Decision Point flow (Hood Ornament moment), value stacking, clarity language, and calm commitment cues—before presenting numbers.
learning_outcomes: Recognize the Decision Point moment and guide it without pressure.
Summarize needs → match → value in a clear, confident way.
Translate features into outcomes (comfort, confidence, safety, simplicity).
Use framing and choice clarity (2–3 options) to reduce decision fatigue.
Use permission-based commitment language that feels respectful and natural.
Set up the numbers conversation with trust, clarity, and shared mission tone.
